resources.string: BY CONNOR WELHAM AND ZANE PRIOR

FLING your ball at the gold target to score points. If you miss, you lose. As you progress it will become increasingly difficult. 

 There are several obstacles you must consider. 
 
 Red Ball: Minus 1 to your score 
 Blue Ball: Switch the direction of your ball 
 Pink Ball: Speeds up your ball 
 Black Ball: Kills your ball 

Sound is from YouTube and BenSound.
